name: C1-Circuit
overview: Set in the city ring road racing game in the battle unfolds Chuningumashin. VRC Battle Stage, a stage win scenario for the ring road, Taimuatakkusuteji, Chuningusuteji equipped. Challenge in setting speed limits Chunpatsu precisely calculated and enjoy the race at midnight. C1 Circuit is a fine drifting racing game with good controls but lack of sprite animation (specially when you turn the car). The graphics are similar to other games like Hard Drivin (the graphic engine is basic but good for his year of release). The audio tracks are the best thing of the game. There are 3 difficulty levels: Easy, Normal & Hard. 4 Different routes but only one circuit.
